title: Angular JS "core selector" dropdown is blank even if cores exist
description:
To reproduce:

1> build Solr
2> bin/solr start -e techproducts
3> go to 8983/solr/index.html
4> Try to select the "techproducts" core from the drop-down

Assigning to Upayavira, but anyone else who wants to get into the new UI stuff please feel free!

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Upayavira I can't seem to assign this to you, but here's the mention that should get into your inbox.

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content:
I suspect you can only assign to committers, mentions are fine.

I've uploaded a patch that should fix this issue - it is a single line change.

I've also uploaded an image that should find its way into the solr/webapp/web/img/ directory, that'll give icons to the cores dropdown for Retina style screen users.
